name: some stuff i made
description:
hi i am a games tutor. i teach game. have done over 2,025 hours of tutoring and over 1,000 hours of Unity dev tutoring specifically. My first released game was Mangoberry for iOS in 2014 (no longer downloadable).

here u can find links to 

Surge - Multiplayer (for iOS) a collab i did with one of my students

Pinku's Chibi Dressroom (for Android) another collab with a student

Emoji Space Inavder (for desktop) made this solo for a game jam

my new youtube channel reviewing other itch games

also yes i am trans (MtF)
